youjin-c.github.io

Art Toy Design

Making wearable art toys, especially on ears.

Design for Discomfort

Performance and proposals exploring discomfort, AI-generated public service advertising, and endurance art.

Detourning the Web

A project exploring the portrait of hashtags and web scraping.

Game Design and The Psychology of Choice

Exploration of automatic and effortful thinking in game design, inspired by ebook reading with audio.

Generative Music

Proposal for an Ambient Poem Rhythm Game, exploring generative music and narration.

Glitch

P5.js sketches for glitch visual programming, interactive with Arduino sensor input.

Go Card

A concept of language education kit for Korean letters using conductive paint and Arduino.

Habitual Energy

Collaborative artwork showing addictive energy of habit through dynamic media installation.

Haptics

Experiments with vibrating motors and haptic feedback, including a rainmaker project.

Humanphobia

Interactive light art wearable referring to social anxiety, calculating distance and showing light patterns.

Machine Learning for the Web

Final proposals for AI-created public service advertising and YOLO to WebVR conversion.

Metabolism

Collaborative artwork presenting interaction of nature and humanity through projection and sound installation.

Motion Recognition

SmartTV service development for controlling TV with finger and hand gestures.

One Zero

Interactive Kinetic Art Installation implying coexistence of human cognitive process and machine perception.

Posture & Eye care

Healthcare web application tracking facial position and eye blink to encourage better posture and eye care.

Sigh Machine

Project plan for a sigh machine using drone motors and twitter bots.

Smile Face-in

LG laptop Gram User Identification System using face recognition and natural facial expressions.

Soft Sensing

Exploration of soft sensing materials and their application in a Korean education kit (Go Card).

The Rest of You

DIY image association test inspired by Tinder-style swiping UI and subconscious desires.

Thesis

Understanding and generating interactive narrative structures using Machine Learning models.

Tweet Reader

Chrome extension for Twitter tweets that reads tweets using Text-to-Speech.

Voice

Exploration of voice interaction, including a Chrome extension for reading tweets and a multiuser game concept.
